txt.en: Many are the gifts that await those who participate in the celebration of Midsummer, but for revelers who join in the merriment for many days, the gifts are all the grander!

'Six days? When we were freebooters we celebrated with much the same enthusiasm and many a cask of Beren's Blood laid empty on the beach at the end of Midsummer's Day.\n\n'It is no fine vintage, but I have another gift for you. Here, my friend!'

As Midsummer's Day approaches, the peoples of Middle-earth come together to celebrate the great festival of Midsummer. Revel in the celebration of dance, merriment, and love with your family and fellows for three more days!

'Six days? In his youth, Lord Forlong celebrated with much the same enthusiasm... and it is said that many a cask of Beren's Blood laid empty at the end of Midsummer's Day.\n\n'It is no fine vintage, but I have another gift for you. Here, my friend!'

As Midsummer's Day approaches, the peoples of Middle-earth come together to celebrate the great festival of Midsummer. Revel in the celebration of dance, merriment, and love with your family and fellows for three more days!
Faeleth can be found in Minas Tirith (Midsummer).\n\nFaeleth would like to thank you for your continued celebration of Midsummer.

As Midsummer's Day approaches, the peoples of Middle-earth come together to celebrate the great festival of Midsummer. Revel in the celebration of dance, merriment, and love with your family and fellows!
Complete 'In Celebration of Midsummer' three more times
Talk to Faeleth in Minas Tirith (Midsummer)
Talk to Captain Kh√¢taphos at Furtherholm in the Shield Isles
